body:
Alike in hdf5 and PR #21900, silo's dependency to zlib in case of a system zlib is altered.
To be noted that on Ubuntu, the system zlib (on /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu) was improperly provided to Silo (on /usr/lib) leading to compilation failure.
I did not report an issue for that.
title: Package silo : zlib system dependency altered as in hdf5
